meta.content: At HCISD, our students begin their journey to 21st century success in a safe environment that strives to promote engaged learning in world-class schools.

div.div: At HCISD, our students begin their journey to 21st century success in a safe environment that strives to promote engaged learning in world-class schools.

span.span: Elementary Schools at or Above State Performance in all subject areas
Seniors commit to post secondary plans
Years TEA Superior Financial Integrity Rating
High Schools named U.S. News and World Report’s Best High Schools
Communities for Music Education designation from The NAMM Foundation

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div: Through Critical Thinking, Collaboration, Creativity and Communication, HCISD students receive high quality instruction from highly effective educators.
HCISD provides an environment that nurtures athletic abilities and further increases scholarship opportunities.
HCISD's outstanding artistic talent is recognized at the state and national level.
HCISD has launched six NEW academies, featuring unique opportunities in Career and Technical Education.
Location: Harlingen School of Health Professions 2302 N 21st St Harlingen, TX 78550
